
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2026-01-21 23:56:42.535396                #
######################################


#leader_trait_army_veteran #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_army_veteran = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer_3 = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_buccaneer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_politician #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_politician_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_politician = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_politician
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_politician       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_politician_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_politician
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2 = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_spark_of_genius }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_trailblazer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer_3 = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_trailblazer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }

#leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_cartographer_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_cartographer }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_inquisitive_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_inquisitive_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_inquisitive_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_inquisitive_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_inquisitive }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_inquisitive_3       
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_inquisitive_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_inquisitive_3

        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_maniacal_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_maniacal_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_maniacal_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_maniacal }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_maniacal_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_maniacal_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_maniacal_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_maniacal_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_science_communicator_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_science_communicator_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_science_communicator }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_science_communicator_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_society_focus_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_society_focus_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_society_focus_3 }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_society_focus_3 = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_society_focus_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_society_focus }
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_society_focus_3       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_society_focus_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_society_focus_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_society_focus_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_educator #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_educator = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_educator
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_educator       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_educator
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_great_researcher #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_great_researcher_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_great_researcher = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_great_researcher
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_great_researcher_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = {
            NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
        }
    }
    allow = {
        root.owner = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
        ruler = {
            add_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat       
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root.owner = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
